entry.title: ABOUT ME
entry.content:
• I am currently an undergraduate student of environmental science and engineering in Hohai University, Nanjing, China. I expect to complete my master study of Statistics in The George Washington University, Washington, DC.
  • I majored in environmental science and engineering through my 4-year undergraduate study. In the meantime, however, my broad and diverse experience has covered Computational Mathematics(publications), Mathematical Statistics & Probability Theory (Intern in Mobike) and Data Analysis in Natural Science (RA experience & undergraduate thesis). These experience brought me a wide sight on my place and made me who I am today.
  • I am on my way to be a researcher in the field of statistics and applied mathematics. You can contact me through yuanchen0705@outlook.com.
  • Choice of homepage theme is from ‘The Legend of Zelda’, a series of outstanding console games which have brought me happiness.
